import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import os

# Data
genres = ['religious art', 'portrait', 'history painting', 'nude', 'mythological painting', 'figure painting', 'allegory', 'interior view', 'genre art', 'Hodegetria']
counts = [54, 16, 10, 8, 4, 3, 3, 1, 1, 1]

# Create figure and axis
fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(12, 8))

# Create horizontal bar chart for better readability
bars = ax.barh(genres, counts, color='steelblue', edgecolor='navy', alpha=0.7)

# Add value labels on the bars
for i, (bar, count) in enumerate(zip(bars, counts)):
    ax.text(count + 0.5, i, str(count), va='center', fontsize=10, fontweight='bold')

# Customize the plot
ax.set_xlabel('Number of Paintings', fontsize=12, fontweight='bold')
ax.set_ylabel('Genre', fontsize=12, fontweight='bold')
ax.set_title('Count of Paintings by Genre', fontsize=14, fontweight='bold', pad=20)
ax.grid(axis='x', alpha=0.3, linestyle='--')

# Invert y-axis to show highest count at the top
ax.invert_yaxis()

# Adjust layout to prevent label cutoff
plt.tight_layout()

# Save the plot
save_path = '/home/bleon/git/XMODE/ArtWork/experiments/log-batch/anthropic-claude-sonnet-4-5-20250929/run-20251210-181613-r001'
os.makedirs(save_path, exist_ok=True)
file_path = os.path.join(save_path, 'paintings_by_genre.png')
plt.savefig(file_path, dpi=300, bbox_inches='tight')

print(f"Plot successfully saved to: {file_path}")
plt.close()

# Data
genres = ['religious art', 'portrait', 'history painting', 'nude', 'mythological painting', 'figure painting', 'allegory', 'interior view', 'genre art', 'Hodegetria']
counts = [54, 16, 10, 8, 4, 3, 3, 1, 1, 1]

# Create figure and axis
fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(12, 8))

# Create horizontal bar chart for better readability
bars = ax.barh(genres, counts, color='steelblue', edgecolor='navy', alpha=0.7)

# Add value labels on the bars
for i, (bar, count) in enumerate(zip(bars, counts)):
    ax.text(count + 0.5, i, str(count), va='center', fontsize=10, fontweight='bold')

# Customize the plot
ax.set_xlabel('Number of Paintings', fontsize=12, fontweight='bold')
ax.set_ylabel('Genre', fontsize=12, fontweight='bold')
ax.set_title('Count of Paintings by Genre', fontsize=14, fontweight='bold', pad=20)
ax.grid(axis='x', alpha=0.3, linestyle='--')

# Invert y-axis to show highest count at the top
ax.invert_yaxis()

# Adjust layout to prevent label cutoff
plt.tight_layout()

# Save the plot
save_path = '/home/bleon/git/XMODE/ArtWork/experiments/log-batch/anthropic-claude-sonnet-4-5-20250929/run-20251210-181613-r001'
os.makedirs(save_path, exist_ok=True)
file_path = os.path.join(save_path, 'paintings_by_genre.png')
plt.savefig(file_path, dpi=300, bbox_inches='tight')

print(f"Plot successfully saved to: {file_path}")
plt.close()
